member.name: T:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions
member.summary: Class that provides extention methods for string

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string into a byte array and hashes it using MD5
member.param: The string that is to be converted
member.returns: A string representation of the hash code converted in hexadecimal format

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string value to a boolean value
member.param: The string that is to be converted
member.returns: The boolean representation of the string

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a number to its 16-bit signed intiger equivalent
member.param: The string that is to be parsed
member.returns: The 16-bit integer representation of the string

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a number to its 32-bit signed intiger equivalent
member.param: The string that is to be parsed
member.returns: The 32-bit integer representation of the string

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a number to its 64-bit signed intiger equivalent
member.param: The string that is to be parsed
member.returns: The 64-bit integer representation of the string

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the specified string representation to its DateTime equivalent
member.param: The string that is to be parsed
member.returns: The DateTime representation of the string

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Capitalises the first letter from the string
member.param: The string that is to be alterated
member.returns: A new string with a capitalised first letter or the input string if its null or empty

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Extracts a substring for a string within a specifyed range
member.param: The string that will be extracted from
The start of the substring
The end of the substring
The starting index to search from
member.returns: The substring or an empty string if no match is found

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: Replaces cyrillic chars in a string with theyr cyrillic latin
member.param: The string that is to be converted
member.returns: The new string with latin chars

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: Replaces latin chars in a string with theyr cyrillic representation
member.param: The string that is to be converted
member.returns: The new string with cyrillic chars

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string into a valid user name
member.param: The string that is to be parsed
member.returns: The string after its chars are converted into latin and any chars that are not letters or numbers are removed

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string into a valid user name
member.param: The string that is to be parsed
member.returns: The string after its chars are converted into cyrillic and any chars that are not letters or numbers are removed

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the speficied amount of chars from the beginning of a string
member.param: The string that is used for extraction
The amount of chars that wll be extracted
member.returns: The specified ammount of chars from left to right in a string format

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the file extention from a file name
member.param: The file name in string format
member.returns: The file extention in string format

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the content type of a file depending on its extention
member.param: The file extention
member.returns: The content ascosiated with the extention

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string value to a byte array
member.param: The string that is to be converted
member.returns: The string represented as a byte array
